00015 std::string PduLogHelper::LogUnbind(Smpp::Unbind* unb){
00016 
00017         char buf[10000] = "";
00018 
00019         std::string msg;
00020 
00021         sprintf(
00022                         buf,
00023                         "SMPP_HEADER:"
00024                                 "common_length(%u), "
00025                                 "common_id(%u), "
00026                                 "common_status(%u), "
00027                                 "seq_number(%u)",
00028                                 unb->command_length(), unb->command_id(), unb->command_status(),
00029                                 unb->sequence_number()
00030 
00031         );
00032 
00033         if (strlen(buf)) {
00034                 msg = buf;
00035         }
00036         return msg;
00037 
00038 }

00096 std::string PduLogHelper::LogSubmitSm(Smpp::SubmitSm* sm) {
00097 
00098         if(sm == NULL){
00099                 return std::string("dynami cast submit sm error occured");
00100         }
00101 
00102         char buf[10000] = "";
00103         std::string msg;
00104 
00105         std::string stype;
00106         stype = sm->service_type();
00107 
00108         unsigned char src_ton, src_npi;
00109         Smpp::SmeAddress addr = sm->source_addr();
00110         src_ton = addr.ton();
00111         src_npi = addr.npi();
00112         std::string src = addr.address();
00113 
00114         unsigned char dst_ton, dst_npi;
00115         addr = sm->destination_addr();
00116         dst_ton = addr.ton();
00117         dst_npi = addr.npi();
00118         std::string dst = addr.address();
00119 
00120         unsigned char esm_class, proto_id, prior_f, reg_deliv, rep_if_pres,
00121                         data_cod, sm_default_msg_id, sm_len;
00122         esm_class = sm->esm_class();
00123         proto_id = sm->protocol_id();
00124         prior_f = sm->priority_flag();
00125         reg_deliv = sm->registered_delivery();
00126         rep_if_pres = sm->replace_if_present_flag();
00127         data_cod = sm->data_coding();
00128         sm_default_msg_id = sm->sm_default_msg_id();
00129         sm_len = sm->sm_length();
00130 //      std::string smsg = SMPPHelper::GetMessage(sm);
00131 
00132         snprintf(buf, 10000, "SMPP_HEADER:"
00133                 "common_length(%u), "
00134                 "common_id(%u), "
00135                 "common_status(%u), "
00136                 "seq_number(%u) MANDATORY_PARAMS: "
00137                 "service_type('%s')),"
00138                 "source_addr_ton(%u)"
00139                 "source_addr_npi(%u)"
00140                 "source_addr_src(%s)"
00141                 "destination_addr_ton(%u)"
00142                 "destination_addr_npi(%u)"
00143                 "destination_addr_src(%s)"
00144                 "esm_class(%u)"
00145                 "protocol_id(%u)"
00146                 "priority_flag(%u)"
00147                 "registered_delivery(%u)"
00148                 "replace_if_present_flag(%u)"
00149                 "data_coding(%u)"
00150                 "sm_default_msg_id(%u)"
00151                 "sm_length(%u)"
00152 //              "sm(%s)"
00153 
00154 //TODO add output for msg body
00155                         , sm->command_length(), sm->command_id(), sm->command_status(),
00156                         sm->sequence_number(), stype.c_str(), src_ton, src_npi,
00157                         src.c_str(), dst_ton, dst_npi, dst.c_str(), esm_class, proto_id,
00158                         prior_f, reg_deliv, rep_if_pres, data_cod, sm_default_msg_id,
00159                         sm_len
00160 
00161         );
00162 
00163         if (strlen(buf))
00164                 msg = buf;
00165 
00166         return msg;
00167 }

00171 std::string PduLogHelper::LogDeliverSm(Smpp::DeliverSm* dm) {
00172 
00173         char buf[1024] = "";
00174         std::string msg;
00175 
00176         std::string stype;
00177         stype = dm->service_type();
00178 
00179         unsigned char src_ton, src_npi;
00180         Smpp::SmeAddress addr = dm->source_addr();
00181         src_ton = addr.ton();
00182         src_npi = addr.npi();
00183         std::string src = addr.address();
00184 
00185         unsigned char dst_ton, dst_npi;
00186         addr = dm->destination_addr();
00187         dst_ton = addr.ton();
00188         dst_npi = addr.npi();
00189         std::string dst = addr.address();
00190 
00191         unsigned char esm_class, proto_id, prior_f, reg_deliv, rep_if_pres,
00192                         data_cod, sm_default_msg_id, sm_len;
00193         esm_class = dm->esm_class();
00194         proto_id = dm->protocol_id();
00195         prior_f = dm->priority_flag();
00196         reg_deliv = dm->registered_delivery();
00197         rep_if_pres = dm->replace_if_present_flag();
00198         data_cod = dm->data_coding();
00199         sm_default_msg_id = dm->sm_default_msg_id();
00200         sm_len = dm->sm_length();
00201 //      std::string smsg = SMPPHelper::GetMessage(dm);
00202 
00203         snprintf(buf, 1024, "SMPP_HEADER:"
00204                 "common_length(%u), "
00205                 "common_id(%u), "
00206                 "common_status(%u), "
00207                 "seq_number(%u) MANDATORY_PARAMS: "
00208                 "service_type('%s')),"
00209                 "source_addr_ton(%u)"
00210                 "source_addr_npi(%u)"
00211                 "source_addr_src(%s)"
00212                 "destination_addr_ton(%u)"
00213                 "destination_addr_npi(%u)"
00214                 "destination_addr_src(%s)"
00215                 "esm_class(%u)"
00216                 "protocol_id(%u)"
00217                 "priority_flag(%u)"
00218                 "registered_delivery(%u)"
00219                 "replace_if_present_flag(%u)"
00220                 "data_coding(%u)"
00221                 "sm_default_msg_id(%u)"
00222                 "sm_length(%u)"
00223 //              "dm(%s)"
00224 
00225                         , dm->command_length(), dm->command_id(), dm->command_status(),
00226                         dm->sequence_number(), stype.c_str(), src_ton, src_npi,
00227                         src.c_str(), dst_ton, dst_npi, dst.c_str(), esm_class, proto_id,
00228                         prior_f, reg_deliv, rep_if_pres, data_cod, sm_default_msg_id,
00229                         sm_len
00230 
00231         );
00232 
00233         return std::string(buf);
00234 }

00237 std::string PduLogHelper::LogDeliverSmResp(Smpp::DeliverSmResp* dmr) {
00238         char buf[1024] = "";
00239 
00240         std::string message_id = dmr->message_id();
00241 
00242         snprintf(buf, 1024, "SMPP_HEADER:"
00243                 "common_length(%u), "
00244                 "common_id(%u), "
00245                 "common_status(%u), "
00246                 "seq_number(%u) MANDATORY_PARAMS: message_id('%s'))",
00247                         dmr->command_length(), dmr->command_id(), dmr->command_status(),
00248                         dmr->sequence_number(), message_id.c_str());
00249 
00250         return std::string(buf);
00251 
00252 }

00273 std::string PduLogHelper::LogBindTvResp(Smpp::BindTransceiverResp* btr) {
00274 
00275         char buf[1024] = "";
00276 
00277         std::string sysId = btr->system_id();
00278         snprintf(
00279                         buf, 1024,
00280                         "SMPP_HEADER:"
00281                                 "common_length(%u), "
00282                                 "common_id(%u), "
00283                                 "common_status(%u), "
00284                                 "seq_number(%u) MANDATORY_PARAMS: system_id('%s')) OPTIONAL_PARAMS: sc_interface_ver()",
00285                         btr->command_length(), btr->command_id(), btr->command_status(),
00286                         btr->sequence_number(), sysId.c_str()
00287 
00288         );
00289 
00290         return std::string(buf);
00291 }

00293 std::string PduLogHelper::LogBindTv(Smpp::BindTransceiver* btv) {
00294         char buf[10000] = "";
00295 
00296         std::string msg;
00297 
00298         std::string sysId = btv->system_id();
00299         std::string pass = btv->password();
00300         std::string sysType = btv->system_type();
00301 
00302         unsigned char ton, npi, ifV;
00303         npi = btv->addr_npi();
00304         ton = btv->addr_ton();
00305         ifV = btv->interface_version();
00306 
00307 
00308         sprintf(
00309                         buf,
00310                         "SMPP_HEADER:"
00311                                 "common_length(%u), "
00312                                 "common_id(%u), "
00313                                 "common_status(%u), "
00314                                 "seq_number(%u) MANDATORY_PARAMS: system_id('%s')), "
00315                                 "password('%s'),"
00316                                 "ton(%u),"
00317                                 "npi(%u),"
00318                                 "interface_version(%u) OPTIONAL_PARAMS system_type('%s')",
00319                         btv->command_length(), btv->command_id(), btv->command_status(),
00320                         btv->sequence_number(), sysId.c_str(), pass.c_str(),
00321                         ton, npi, ifV, sysType.c_str()
00322 
00323         );
00324 
00325         if (strlen(buf)) {
00326                 msg = buf;
00327         }
00328 
00329         return msg;
00330 }
